Text:
Man has sex with a chimpanzee which is HIV-positive. He contracts virus end of store.

If you feel this is unlikely, beware that it goes on today...

"AIDS" is not caused by vaccination campaigns. Even if viruses  could live in storage for several weeks without warmth and air how could should it transmit from generation to generation?
Celebrities have become custodians and promoters of "incurable" diseases and growing links to drug companies and think tanks.
It is easy to "cure" "AIDS" when it is understood that it is the diagnosis, prior health challenges and the treatment, sometimes in combination that can kill.
If "AIDS" (29 old diseases) is caused by one virus that is supposed, on the one hand, to be so deadly and yet on the other hand have a laten period of 20 years perhaps we should question whether the virus has been isolated properly, whether the tests do detect a virus or just general antibodies, whether the meds prolong life or shorten it. What about Africa?????
Watch AIDS Inc on Youtube or download on PirateBay. QuestionAIDS.com

Thats pretty much the official story isn't it? That man had sex with a monkey that was infected with aids and now it's a superkiller. My question is how long have people in the jungle been having sex with primates? Thousands of years im sure, and coincedently this virus emerges during the greates era of black civil rights and open homosexuality...

First off, why the hell does the story have to begin with "Man has sex with chimpanzee.."??? Isn't it more likely that the virus is going to spread from a male chimp to a female human or are there really that many gay africans and chimpanzees running around the congo hooking up on the down low??? Seriously though, this documentary tells the true story. Everybody knows the HIV virus has mutation capabilities, and the fact that this doctor forced tribal chiefs to have this new polio vaccine given to them  why is it so hard to believe that the vaccine contained traces of the virus which then eventually mutated into the killer it is today? And if it was a bunch of bs then why would they fight so hard to keep it hidden? Why lie about never using chimpanzee livers when there's solid proof and eye witness statements revealing the truth???? Face it, even though his intentions were pure, man created one disease to destroy another. end of story
